text: Nabii Huud mari:Huudow atu tet (Yallitte kinnuk) qibaadak nee waasseemih sabbatah Ni Yallittek garab koo gaynaqeeh (yiqintireeh) koo cabboyseh inna nee akke waytek kalah kok innam mannu kaak iyyen, Nabii Huud keenil gacisak : diggah anu axceh aniimil Yalla sumaaqisaah isin Yallat agleytiitih haytaanamak anu bari kinniyoomuh sin sumaaqisak isin yoh sumaaqita keenik iyye
